channel.title: Need help with commands

item.title: Need help with commands
item.dc:creator: @DesiDre DesiDre
item.description:
@DesiDre wrote:

number one. making the code for owner is self explanatory looking at those code, the same code just different player rights and instead of saying so and so has made you admin or mod say so and so has made you owner. with those codes does the player disconeect. and are your player rights 3 when doing it?

item.title: Need help with commands
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

everytime i try to ::demote or ::givemod or ::giveadmin etc… it’s not working. idk if it’s wrong code in client.java or something else. i know the manual way but i need to fix the commands! please help me!!! this is the current code in there.

Hidden admin

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“GiveHidden”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
try
{
String otherPName = command.substring(11);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1)
			{
				client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
				p.playerRights = 4;
				p.sM(playerName + " has made you an Hidden Admin!");
				sM("You have made " + p.playerName + " an Hidden Admin!");
				p.disconnected = true;
				p.logoutButton = true;
			}
			else
			{
				sM("The name doesnt exist.");
			}
		}
		catch (Exception e)
		{
			sM("Try entering a name you want to promote..");
		}
	}
	if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("GiveAdmin") && playerRights >= 3)
	{
		try
		{
			String otherPName = command.substring(10);
			int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1)
			{
				client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
				p.playerRights = 2;
				p.sM(playerName + " has made you aan Admin!");
				sM("You have made " + p.playerName + " an Admin!");
				p.disconnected = true;
				p.logoutButton = true;
			}
			else
			{
				sM("The name doesnt exist.");
			}
		}
		catch (Exception e)
		{
			sM("Try entering a name you want to promote..");
		}</blockquote>[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 28, 2009, 10:05:22 am[/size][hr]Admins
} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("GiveAdmin") && playerRights >= 3) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); 
			if (otherPIndex != -1)
			{
				client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
				p.playerRights = 2;
				p.sM(playerName + " has made you aan Admin!");
				sM("You have made " + p.playerName + " an Admin!");
				p.disconnected = true;
				p.logoutButton = true;
			}
			else
			{
				sM("The name doesnt exist.");
			}
		}
		catch (Exception e)
		{
			sM("Try entering a name you want to promote..");
		}</blockquote>[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 28, 2009, 10:05:52 am[/size][hr]Mods
} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("GIveMod") && playerRights >= 3) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(8); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); 
			if (otherPIndex != -1)
			{
				client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
				p.playerRights = 1;
				p.sM(playerName + " has made you a Mod!");
				sM("You have made " + p.playerName + " a Mod!");
				p.disconnected = true;
				p.logoutButton = true;
			}
			else
			{
				sM("The name doesnt exist.");
			}
		}
		catch (Exception e)

			sM("Try entering a name you want to promote..");
